entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is described as looking upset and scared of the "them". He says he's not scared but his tone suggests otherwise.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is described as patting Neville on the shoulder with a smile that looks like a leer to Harry. She speaks in a loud and slow voice.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as being looked up at by Umbridge. He is not described in detail but is referred to as "Well, Hagrid".

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy and Pansy Parkinson are laughing at Umbridge's behavior.

entities.name: pansy parkinson
entities.description: Pansy Parkinson is mentioned as laughing along with Malfoy.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as shaking with fury at Umbridge's behavior.

relationships.description: Umbridge pats Neville on the shoulder.
Umbridge speaks to Hagrid in a loud and slow voice.
Pansy Parkinson laughs at Umbridge's behavior.
